spell.name: Bacterial Barrage
entries: You attack a creature in range with a quick spreading infection that takes advantage of existing conditions. Make a ranged spell attack against a target, on a hit the infection does {@damage 1d8} necrotic damage to the target. If the target is suffering from the {@condition poisoned} condition or a disease, it instead takes {@damage 1d12} necrotic damage.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: This spell's damage increases by one die when you reach 5th level ({@dice 2d8 or 2d12}), 11th level ({@dice 3d8 or 3d12}), and 17th level ({@dice 4d8 or 4d12}).
